formulas.name: soqlOpenPayments
formulas.expression: "SELECT id, Name, Account__c, Amount_to_Pay__c, Credit__c, Status__c, Payment_date__c, Is_Gift__c, Checkout_URL__c from Payment__c where Status__c ='At Branch' AND Account__c = '"+ {!Get_Account_Refresh.Id} +"' AND Amount_to_Pay__c > 0 ORDER BY Name "

fields.name: headerCredit
fields.fieldText:
{!sectionBox}

Koľko X-Tokenov chceš vrátiť a prečo?

fields.name: warningPayment
fields.fieldText:
{!yellowBox}

Minusová hodnota X-Tokenov. Vykonaj platbu

fields.name: textSection
fields.fieldText:
{!sectionBox}

Informácie o najbližšom tréningu

fields.name: errorCode
fields.fieldText: Zadaný identifikátor nie je správny

fields.name: SectionBooo
fields.fieldText:
{!sectionBox}

Zadaj prosím identifikátor zákazníka

fields.name: erroror
fields.fieldText: Tvoja session expirovala. Prosím, znova sa naloguj cez hlavné menu

textTemplates.name: successBox
textTemplates.text: <div class="slds-box slds-theme_shade" style="background-color: green; color: white">
